title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch - your ultimate companion for surfing and outdoor adventures!

Experience unlimited battery life with solar charging capabilities, providing up to 48 hours of continuous GPS mode usage with just 3 hours of 50,000 lux sunlight per day. With its rugged, fiber-reinforced polymer case and scratch-resistant Corning Gorilla glass, this watch is built to withstand the toughest conditions.

Track your surfing performance with wave counter, max speed, distance, and tide data. For windsurfing and kiteboarding enthusiasts, monitor your GPS position, speed, distance, heart rate, and elevation data for jumps.

Stay connected with Surfline Sessions, smart notifications, and Connect IQ compatibility. Preloaded activity profiles include running, biking, swimming, and strength training. Navigate with ease using the 3-axis compass, barometric altimeter, and satellite systems (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo).

Monitor your health with heart rate, sleep tracking, Pulse Ox, and respiration tracking. This watch is water-rated to 100 meters, thermal-resistant, and shock-resistant, making it the perfect choice for any outdoor adventure.

Upgrade your outdoor experience with the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition GPS Outdoor Watch - the perfect combination of durability, functionality, and style!
